description: This is a sample application with internationalization

notFound.title: Page lost in the ocean
notFound.description: It seems we can't find the page you're looking for. Perhaps it drifted away with the tide or never existed.
notFound.helpText: If you believe this is an error, please contact support

sidebar.title: Navigation Panel
sidebar.description: This is the navigation panel. You can create new layouts, search notes, and manage your file structure.
sidebar.feature1: Create new layouts for organizing notes

createLayout.title: Create Layout
createLayout.description: Click here to create a new layout for organizing your notes.
createLayout.feature1: Click to create a new layout
createLayout.feature2: Organize notes by topics or projects
createLayout.feature3: Add nested folders for better structure

search.title: Search Notes
search.description: Use search to quickly find the notes or layouts you need.

profile.title: User Profile
profile.description: Click here to open your profile and change settings.

themeSwitcher.title: Theme Switcher
themeSwitcher.description: Switch between light and dark interface themes.
themeSwitcher.feature1: Light theme for comfortable daytime work

languageSwitcher.title: Language Selection
languageSwitcher.feature1: Support for Russian and English languages

logout.title: Log Out
logout.description: Click here to log out of your account.
